Memories of Science Ninja TeamÂ Gatchaman

25 Nov 2008

Came across the art of Phil Noto, who has made it to my list of top favourite illustrators. So reminiscent of Tatsuo Yoshida of Gatchaman and Mach Go Go Go fame. Classic.

Led me to the idea for my next tattoo: Jun [or Princess, if you watched it as Battle of the Planets] on my wrist. Yay!
